hazards to be expected on site. We have read and are committed to following the Health and

our exhibits, demonstrations and work practices will cause no significant risk to either others or
ourselves on site. and made our stand staff aware of the hazards to be expected on site. We have read and passed
them the Health and Safety Rules in the Exhibitors Manual and are satisfied they are competent to
undertake their tasks safely. We have ensured that a risk assessment is carried out for any
proposed stand activities, product demonstrations and public demonstrations. Where the activity
or product demonstration gives rise to significant risk full details have been submitted to the
organiser with a copy of the risk assessments, method statement and stand plans / product
specification.</contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/><styleitem type="border" padding="bottom,right,top,left,"><styles><styleitem </contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/><styleitem type="border" padding="bottom,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-bottom" value="30px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3c0ugH-330" model="EventEditionForm" allowhtml="true" cssclass="TemplateBackground Description templateFontWeight"><contents>Please ensure that Space Only Stand Exhibitors and Contractors read the below information with careful consideration. To confirm that you have read the below information and agree to adhere to the Space Only Stand Fitting Regulations, please complete the necessary fields and submit. When you click submit, this will be sent to {{Operation_Admin_1__c}} and {{Operation_Admin_2__c}}.
</br>
</br>
Please submit the Space Only Stand Fitting Regulations by {{Deadline__c}}
</br>
</br>
Please note, Exhibitors will only be provided with Permission to Build once {{Operation_Admin_1__c}} have received a complete Risk Assessment, Method Statement, Stand Contractor Form and Space Only Stand Fitting Regulations. 
</contents><renderconditions logictype="and"/></template></components></division><division behavior="specified" verticalalign="top" width="100%"><components><basicfieldeditor showheader="true" showsavecancel="false" showerrorsinline="true" model="FormData" buttonposition="" uniqueid="sk-3JfUqE-358" mode="edit" layout="" cssclass="fieldEditorColor"><columns layoutmode="fixed"><column width="51%"><sections><section title="{{$Label.Exhibition_Details}}:" collapsible="no"><fields><field id="Name" valuehalign="" type="" uniqueid="sk-1xQ1iv-94" required="true"><label>Exhibition Company:</label><renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep"/><enableconditions/></field><field uniqueid="sk-3w71J4-490" id="Full_Name__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""/><field id="Hall_No__c" uniqueid="sk-1xQ1ix-96" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type="" required="true"><label>Stand Number</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3cJp4Y-550" id="Direct_No__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type="" required="true"><label>Site Number</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3cJueU-570" id="Email__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type="" readonly="false" required="true"/><field uniqueid="sk-3cJ_Gx-595" id="Declaration_Authorised_By__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type="" required="true"/><field uniqueid="sk-3cK1IC-608" id="Position__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type="" required="true"/></fields><renderconditions logictype="and"/></section></sections></column><column width="50%"><sections/><renderconditions logictype="and"/></column><column width="51%"><sections><section title="Individual from Exhibiting Company with Overall Responsibility for Health &amp; Safety on Site:" collapsible="no"><fields><field uniqueid="sk-3cKjzP-640" id="Contact_Name__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type="" required="true"><label>Name:</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3cKjzP-641" id="Contact_Position__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type="" required="true"><label>Position:</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3cKjzQ-642" id="Contact_Mobile_Number__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type="" required="true"><label>Mobile Number:</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3uBXIE-754" id="Contact_Email__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>Email:</label></field></fields></section></sections></column></columns><renderconditions logictype="and"/></basicfieldeditor></components></division><division behavior="specified" verticalalign="top" width="100%" uniqueid="SecondHeader" cssclass="MainCSS "><components><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3uB0y6-655"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3uAqZI-615" allowhtml="true"><contents><hr></contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="bottom,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-bottom" value="40px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3tw4Zn-1051" cssclass=""><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wNl4O-625" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>GENERAL</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wNurj-654"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wNxW3-662" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><ul>
<li>It is the responsibility of Space Only Exhibitors to examine the site allocated to you to avoid costly adjustments to stand structures on site as minor obstructions or reduced headroom (for which the Organisers can accept no responsibility) cannot always be indicated on the Exhibition floorplan</li>
<li>If you have booked a Space Only stand it is your responsibility to design and construct your own stand - you will receive no items (walling, stand fitting, flooring etc.) from the Organisers
</li>
<li>You may use a Contractor of your choice for the design and construction of Space Only stands however the Organisers must give final approval to any Contractors appointed by Exhibitors before they commence building on site
</li>
<li>It is the responsibility of the Exhibitor to ensure their Contractors are properly accredited with regards to health & safety, workmanship, service and business practice.  It is also the responsibility of the Exhibitor to ensure that their Contractors adhere to all the rules and regulations stipulated in the Exhibitor Manual
</li>
<li>It is the responsibility of the Exhibitor to ensure their Contractors are properly accredited with regards to health & safety, workmanship, service and business practice.  It is also the responsibility of the Exhibitor to ensure that their Contractors adhere to all the rules and regulations stipulated in the Exhibitor Manual
</li>
</ul></contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="bottom,left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wOh34-810" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>STAND CONSTRUCTION </b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wP4jS-917"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wPAXo-943" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>The maximum build height of stand fitting for stands is 4m from floor level. Construction over this height is not permitted</li>
  <li>The minimum height for dividing walls is  {{Minimum_Stand_Height__c}} and the maximum is 4m.</li>
  <li>Double Deck stands are not permitted</li>
</ul></contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wPNW6-994" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>Regulations</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wPSxe-1015"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wPVIP-1033" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>All stands are required to be structurally stable and self-supporting.  Fixing to the fabric of the venue is not permitted</li>
  <li>All stands must provide a wall as a dividing line with your neighbouring stands.  This minimum wall height is  {{Minimum_Stand_Height__c}} and the maximum is 4m</li>
  <li>Stands that neighbour Shell Scheme stands are not permitted to attach any materials to the Shell Scheme and must deduct 55mm from the overall stand measurements to ensure they fit within the allotted space</li>
  <li>All stand construction and displays must be made from fireproofed materials and installed to the satisfaction of the authorities</li>
  <li>All electrical installations must be carried out by the official contractor.</li>
  <li>The corners of raised floors on stands must be splayed, rounded or angled to prevent sharp corners and tripping hazards</li>
  <li>All carpet tape must be removed and any charges for the removal of remaining carpet tape at the end of Breakdown will be charged directly to the Exhibitor </li>
  <li>The required minimum effective clear width of a door is 800mm. All doors should be provided with a vision panel of clear glazing giving a zone of visibility from 900mm to 1500mm above floor level to enable fire detection.  Doors facing gangways must always open inwards</li>
  <li>Stands that incorporate a raised platform floor of 60mm and above are required to include a ramp for ease of access</li>
  <li>Any stand requiring piped services must provide a platform floor of at least 100mm from floor level to hide the pipes</li>
  <li>All timber construction must be pre-fabricated.  The cutting of construction materials onsite must be kept to a minimum</li>
</ul> </contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wT1Gr-1247" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>WALLING</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wT66q-1266"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wT705-1277" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>Long runs of solid walling must be avoided along sides open to gangways. No more than a maximum of 50% of any open side to a gangway can be constructed with solid wall panels</li>
  <li>Walls above  {{Minimum_Stand_Height__c}} high which overlook adjoining stands must be finished neatly to the satisfaction of the Organisers in a plain and neutral colour with no advertising or branding</li>
  <li>Wall panels that face open gangways must be decorated with display graphics and not be left plain</li>
</ul> </contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wTa8c-1338" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>BRIDGING ACROSS GANGWAYS</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wTeRw-1357"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wTfMN-1368" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>Bridging across gangways will only be permitted after stand build plans have been submitted and approved by {{Operation_Admin_1__c}} and the venue</li>
  <li>Additional signage to designated emergency exit points may be required when bridging over mandatory gangways</li>
  <li>The gangway must remain free of obstructions and be clearly identified at floor level by means of a variance in colour or shade of flooring</li>
</ul> </contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wT_d9-1435" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>RIGGING</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wU39O-1453"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wU404-1464" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>All proposed rigging must be included in your proposed stand design and approved in advance by {{Operation_Admin_1__c}} and the venue</li>
  <li>The fixing of all primary rigging points must be carried out by the venue</li>
  <li>Rigging of any structures other than lighting or lightweight banners with aluminium frame is classed as complex and structural calculations are required. This will be subject to a fixed fee of £275 + VAT (without exception) for a pre-show and onsite structural engineer check</li>
  <li>The maximum height for the top of a truss or rigging fixings is 8m from floor level</li>
</ul> </contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wUIlh-1535" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>MACHINERY EXHIBITS</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wUO0M-1554"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wUOZD-1565" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><ul>
  <li>Working machinery exhibits must be suitably guarded and set back a minimum of 0.5m from any open side of the stand.  Compliance with this is mandatory</li>
</ul></contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wUXzA-1616" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>SPACE ONLY STAND AGREMENT</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wUmIg-1661"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wUe8h-1641" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents>All Space Only Exhibitors must complete and submit the following by {{Deadline__c}} to  {{Operation_Admin_1__c}}: {{Operation_Admin_1_Email__c}}</contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wUsEV-1686"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wUtAE-1696" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><ul>
  <li>Exhibitors undertake to construct a stand that is in keeping with the reputation of TOC Events Worldwide.  Should a stand, in the opinion of the Organisers, fail to be of a quality that is in keeping with the event then the Organisers have the authority to carry out any actions applicable and any additional costs or expenses are to be borne by the Exhibitor.</li>
  <li>A full set of plans in English showing all dimension to a clearly recognised scale, with side elevations, front elevation and plan view</li>
  <li>Plans should also show the position of machinery exhibits</li>
  <li>A signed copied of this Space Only Stand Fitting Regulations Agreement including contractor details</li>
  <li>Risk assessment for the build and breakdown periods and a risk assessment for the open period</li>
  <li>Method statement (including details of rigging if applicable and details of any machinery if applicable)</li>
  <li>Health & safety declaration</li>
  <li>Structural calculations (for complex stands only)</li>
</ul></contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="bottom,"><styles><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wVLDU-1825" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents>All forms can be found online in the Exhibitor Manual. Stand plans should be submitted to {{Operation_Admin_1__c}} on E: {{Operation_Admin_1_Email__c}} or using the form in the Exhibitor Manual.</contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="bottom,top,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-top" value="20px"/><styleitem property="padding-bottom" value="0px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wW2Cs-1872" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>SPACE ONLY CONTRACTOR CONTACT INFORMATION AND AGREEMENT:</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wW9Cv-1894"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wWDsa-1920" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents>By signing this document, you are agreeing to adhere to the stand fitting regulations and confirm that you will abide by all regulations and carry out best practice at {{Event_Edition__c}} to make it a sustainable exhibition.</contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wWH1U-1935"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wWJ46-1953" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>Staff will wear sufficient personal protective equipment (PPE) during build up and breakdown</li>
  <li>If complex fees are applicable payment will be made in advance by the Exhibitor before the stand is approved</li>
  <li>The stand will arrive prefabricated where possible and any machine based carpentry must be detailed in the method statement</li>
  <li>The stand will be removed from the Exhibition Hall before {{Event_Edition__c}}</li>
</ul>  
{{Stand_Removal_Date_Time__c}}</contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" </contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="bottom,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-bottom" value="30px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3cNV6z-1004" allowhtml="true" model="EventEditionForm" cssclass="TemplateBackground Description templateFontWeight"><contents>Please ensure that Space Only Stand Exhibitors and Contractors read the below information with careful consideration. To confirm that you have read the below information and agree to adhere to the Space Only Stand Fitting Regulations, please complete the necessary fields and submit. When you click submit, this will be sent to {{Operation_Admin_1__c}} and {{Operation_Admin_2__c}}.
</br>
</br>
Please submit the Space Only Stand Fitting Regulations by {{Deadline__c}}
</br>
</br>
Please note, Exhibitors will only be provided with Permission to Build once {{Operation_Admin_1__c}} have received a complete Risk Assessment, Method Statement, Stand Contractor Form and Space Only Stand Fitting Regulations. 
</contents></template></components></division><division behavior="specified" verticalalign="top" width="100%"><components><basicfieldeditor showheader="true" showsavecancel="false" showerrorsinline="true" model="FormData" buttonposition="" uniqueid="sk-3JfUqE-358" mode="readonly" layout="" cssclass="fieldEditorColor"><columns layoutmode="fixed"><column width="50%"><sections><section title="Exhibition Details:" collapsible="no"><fields><field id="Name" valuehalign="" type="" uniqueid="sk-1xQ1kS-159"><label>Exhibition Name</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3w77fh-538" id="Full_Name__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""/><field id="Hall_No__c" uniqueid="sk-1xQ1kU-161" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>Stand Number</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3cNkOQ-1081" id="Direct_No__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>Site Number</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3cNoGF-1101" id="Email__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""/><field uniqueid="sk-3cNp-l-1105" id="Declaration_Authorised_By__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""/><field uniqueid="sk-3cNs7N-1112" id="Position__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""/></fields><renderconditions logictype="and"/></section><section title="Individual from Exhibiting Company with Overall Responsibility for Health &amp; Safety on Site:" collapsible="no"><fields><field uniqueid="sk-3cNypN-1144" id="Contact_Name__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>Name</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3cNypN-1145" id="Contact_Position__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>Position</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3cNypN-1146" id="Contact_Mobile_Number__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>Mobile Number</label></field><field uniqueid="sk-3cNypO-1147" id="Contact_Email__c" showhelp="false" valuehalign="" type=""><label>Email</label></field></fields></section></sections></column><column width="50%"><sections><section title="New Section" collapsible="no" showheader="false"><fields/></section></sections></column></columns><renderconditions logictype="and"/></basicfieldeditor></components></division><division behavior="specified" verticalalign="top" width="100%" uniqueid="SecondHeader" cssclass="MainCSS"><components><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3vz16I-602"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3vz2Sf-613" allowhtml="true"><contents><hr></contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="bottom,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-bottom" value="40px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3vzCJd-639" cssclass=""><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wXstT-2091" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>GENERAL</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wXvz0-2101"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wXyC1-2118" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
<li>It is the responsibility of Space Only Exhibitors to examine the site allocated to you to avoid costly adjustments to stand structures on site as minor obstructions or reduced headroom (for which the Organisers can accept no responsibility) cannot always be indicated on the Exhibition floorplan</li>
<li>If you have booked a Space Only stand it is your responsibility to design and construct your own stand - you will receive no items (walling, stand fitting, flooring etc.) from the Organisers
</li>
<li>You may use a Contractor of your choice for the design and construction of Space Only stands however the Organisers must give final approval to any Contractors appointed by Exhibitors before they commence building on site
</li>
<li>It is the responsibility of the Exhibitor to ensure their Contractors are properly accredited with regards to health & safety, workmanship, service and business practice.  It is also the responsibility of the Exhibitor to ensure that their Contractors adhere to all the rules and regulations stipulated in the Exhibitor Manual
</li>
<li>It is the responsibility of the Exhibitor to ensure their Contractors are properly accredited with regards to health & safety, workmanship, service and business practice.  It is also the responsibility of the Exhibitor to ensure that their Contractors adhere to all the rules and regulations stipulated in the Exhibitor Manual
</li>
</ul></contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wX-HZ-2132" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>STAND CONSTRUCTION </b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wY1qb-2147"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wY3AT-2158" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>The maximum build height of stand fitting for stands is 4m from floor level. Construction over this height is not permitted</li>
  <li>The minimum height for dividing walls is  {{Minimum_Stand_Height__c}} and the maximum is 4m.</li>
  <li>Double Deck stands are not permitted</li>
</ul></contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wY6iy-2185" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>Regulations</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wY8-w-2200"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wYAJS-2211" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>All stands are required to be structurally stable and self-supporting.  Fixing to the fabric of the venue is not permitted</li>
  <li>All stands must provide a wall as a dividing line with your neighbouring stands.  This minimum wall height is  {{Minimum_Stand_Height__c}} and the maximum is 4m</li>
  <li>Stands that neighbour Shell Scheme stands are not permitted to attach any materials to the Shell Scheme and must deduct 55mm from the overall stand measurements to ensure they fit within the allotted space</li>
  <li>All stand construction and displays must be made from fireproofed materials and installed to the satisfaction of the authorities</li>
  <li>All electrical installations must be carried out by the official contractor.</li>
  <li>The corners of raised floors on stands must be splayed, rounded or angled to prevent sharp corners and tripping hazards</li>
  <li>All carpet tape must be removed and any charges for the removal of remaining carpet tape at the end of Breakdown will be charged directly to the Exhibitor </li>
  <li>The required minimum effective clear width of a door is 800mm. All doors should be provided with a vision panel of clear glazing giving a zone of visibility from 900mm to 1500mm above floor level to enable fire detection.  Doors facing gangways must always open inwards</li>
  <li>Stands that incorporate a raised platform floor of 60mm and above are required to include a ramp for ease of access</li>
  <li>Any stand requiring piped services must provide a platform floor of at least 100mm from floor level to hide the pipes</li>
  <li>All timber construction must be pre-fabricated.  The cutting of construction materials onsite must be kept to a minimum</li>
</ul> </contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wYFz4-2237" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>WALLING</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wYIk4-2254"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wYKsU-2272" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>Long runs of solid walling must be avoided along sides open to gangways. No more than a maximum of 50% of any open side to a gangway can be constructed with solid wall panels</li>
  <li>Walls above  {{Minimum_Stand_Height__c}} high which overlook adjoining stands must be finished neatly to the satisfaction of the Organisers in a plain and neutral colour with no advertising or branding</li>
  <li>Wall panels that face open gangways must be decorated with display graphics and not be left plain</li>
</ul> </contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wYTEy-2284" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>BRIDGING ACROSS GANGWAYS</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wYWNO-2293"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wYaXO-2321" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>Bridging across gangways will only be permitted after stand build plans have been submitted and approved by {{Operation_Admin_1__c}} and the venue</li>
  <li>Additional signage to designated emergency exit points may be required when bridging over mandatory gangways</li>
  <li>The gangway must remain free of obstructions and be clearly identified at floor level by means of a variance in colour or shade of flooring</li>
</ul> </contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wa8su-2336" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>RIGGING</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3waZeI-2351"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wadSg-2369" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>All proposed rigging must be included in your proposed stand design and approved in advance by {{Operation_Admin_1__c}} and the venue</li>
  <li>The fixing of all primary rigging points must be carried out by the venue</li>
  <li>Rigging of any structures other than lighting or lightweight banners with aluminium frame is classed as complex and structural calculations are required. This will be subject to a fixed fee of £275 + VAT (without exception) for a pre-show and onsite structural engineer check</li>
  <li>The maximum height for the top of a truss or rigging fixings is 8m from floor level</li>
</ul> </contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wagV4-2384" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>MACHINERY EXHIBITS</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wajL8-2401"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wal7g-2419" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><ul>
  <li>Working machinery exhibits must be suitably guarded and set back a minimum of 0.5m from any open side of the stand.  Compliance with this is mandatory</li>
</ul></contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wanlq-2434" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>SPACE ONLY STAND AGREMENT</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3waqDZ-2446"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wasAD-2467" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents>All Space Only Exhibitors must complete and submit the following by {{Deadline__c}} to  {{Operation_Admin_1__c}}: {{Operation_Admin_1_Email__c}}</contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wazWW-2500"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wa-uh-2515" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><ul>
  <li>Exhibitors undertake to construct a stand that is in keeping with the reputation of TOC Events Worldwide.  Should a stand, in the opinion of the Organisers, fail to be of a quality that is in keeping with the event then the Organisers have the authority to carry out any actions applicable and any additional costs or expenses are to be borne by the Exhibitor.</li>
  <li>A full set of plans in English showing all dimension to a clearly recognised scale, with side elevations, front elevation and plan view</li>
  <li>Plans should also show the position of machinery exhibits</li>
  <li>A signed copied of this Space Only Stand Fitting Regulations Agreement including contractor details</li>
  <li>Risk assessment for the build and breakdown periods and a risk assessment for the open period</li>
  <li>Method statement (including details of rigging if applicable and details of any machinery if applicable)</li>
  <li>Health & safety declaration</li>
  <li>Structural calculations (for complex stands only)</li>
</ul></contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wb2QX-2530" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents>All forms can be found online in the Exhibitor Manual. Stand plans should be submitted to {{Operation_Admin_1__c}} on E: {{Operation_Admin_1_Email__c}} or using the form in the Exhibitor Manual.</contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="top,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-top" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wb5oO-2545" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight"><contents><b>SPACE ONLY CONTRACTOR CONTACT INFORMATION AND AGREEMENT:</b></contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wb8J2-2560"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wbCvU-2578" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents>By signing this document, you are agreeing to adhere to the stand fitting regulations and confirm that you will abide by all regulations and carry out best practice at {{Event_Edition__c}} to make it a sustainable exhibition.</contents></template><wrapper uniqueid="sk-3wbE-U-2593"><components><template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-3wbG8w-2604" allowhtml="true" cssclass="templateFontWeight" model="EventEditionForm"><contents><ul>
  <li>Staff will wear sufficient personal protective equipment (PPE) during build up and breakdown</li>
  <li>If complex fees are applicable payment will be made in advance by the Exhibitor before the stand is approved</li>
  <li>The stand will arrive prefabricated where possible and any machine based carpentry must be detailed in the method statement</li>
  <li>The stand will be removed from the Exhibition Hall before {{Event_Edition__c}}</li>
</ul>  
{{Stand_Removal_Date_Time__c}}</contents></template></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem type="border" padding="left,"><styles><styleitem property="padding-left" value="20px"/><styleitem property="box-sizing" value="border-box"/></styles></styleitem><styleitem type="size"/></styles></wrapper></components><styles><styleitem type="background"/><styleitem     ** Snippet to remove the hyperlink from the field
*/
var field = arguments[0],
value = arguments[1],
$ = skuid.$;	
    
//If we are in edit mode render the reference field as pick list    
    if(field.mode === 'edit') 
    {
// temporarily set to REFPICK so we get the stock reference picklist functionality
        field.options.type = 'REFPICK';
// render away 
        skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field, value);
// set it back to custom
        field.options.type = 'CUSTOM';
    }

// If we're  in read mode, then remove hyperlink 
if (field.mode !== 'edit') 
{
   skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field, value);
    var linkTag = $('a', field.element);
    if(linkTag.length)
    {
        var output = $('<div>');
        output.append(linkTag.html());
    }   
    linkTag.replaceWith(output);
}</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="TotalAllocatedBages" cachelocation="false">/*

</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ckTextArea" cachelocation="false">SetupCKTextArea(
	arguments[0] //Field
	, arguments[1] //Value
);</jsitem><jsitem location="inline" name="SetupCKTextArea" cachelocation="false" url="">var $ = skuid.$;

window.CKSettings = {
    removePlugins: 'pagebreak,preview,print,save,selectall,showblocks,showborders,smiley,tab,clipboard,panelbutton,colorbutton,colordialog,templates,div,resize,elementspath,enterkey,entities,popup,filebrowser,find,flash,floatingspace,forms,htmlwriter,iframe,menubutton,language,magicline,newpage,pagebreak,selectall,subscript,superscript,showblocks,showborders,scayt,tab,tabletools,justify,bidi,font'
    ,removeButtons: 'Subscript,Superscript,Underline'
};

function SetupCKTextArea(field, value) {
    /* Create and grab DOM elements */        
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers.TEXTAREA.edit(field, value);
    var uniqid = RandomID();
    field.element.attr('id', uniqid);
    setTimeout(function(){
        var element = $("#" + uniqid + ">div");
        element.html(element.text());
        var instance = CKEDITOR.replace(element[0], window.CKSettings);
        instance.on('change', function() {
            var fieldRow = field.row
                , fieldId = field.id
                , fieldText = this.getData()
                , fieldData = {};
            fieldData[fieldId] = fieldText;
            console.log(field);
            field.model.updateRow(fieldRow, fieldData, {initiatorId : field._GUID});
            
        });
    },100);
}
function RandomID() {
    var S4 = function() {
        return (((1+Math.random())*0x10000)|0).toString(16).substring(1);
    };
    return (S4()+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+S4()+S4());
}

var acc = document.getElementsByClassName("cc-accountContact-header-accordion");

    ** PageLoad Snippet to display account contact lists as per event edition
*/
(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	 //$(window).on('load',function(){
    	var modelA = skuid.model.getModel('EventDetail');
        var rowE = modelA.getFirstRow();
        var eId= rowE.Id;
    	var modelCU = skuid.model.getModel('CurrentUser');
        var rowCU = modelCU.getFirstRow();
        var accId = rowCU.Contact.AccountId;
    	var modelB = skuid.model.getModel('AccountContactUI');
    	var modelBooth = skuid.model.getModel('ExpocadBoothUI');
    	
        var result = sforce.apex.execute('EventEditionAccountContact','EventEditionAccountContact', { eId:eId, accId: accId});
        console.log(result);
        var resultBooth = sforce.apex.execute('EventEditionAccountContact','EventEditionAccountEventBooth', { eId:eId, accId: accId});
        console.log(resultBooth);
    	var conList = JSON.parse(result);
    	console.log(conList);
    	var boothList = JSON.parse(resultBooth);
    	console.log(boothList);
    	//var rowsToInsert = {}
    	// Populating UI Model with data capture from salesforce for product
     	if(conList)
        {
            $.each(conList, function( index,value) {
            var contactList = modelB.createRow({ 
                    additionalConditions: [
                        { field: 'ContactId', value: value.ContactId},
                        { field: 'FirstName', value: value.FirstName},
                        { field: 'LastName', value: value.LastName},
                        { field: 'ContactType', value: value.ContactType},
                    ],doAppend: true});
            } );
            
            
            modelB.save();
        }
       
        modelB.save();
        
        if(boothList)
        {
            $.each(boothList, function( index,value) {
            var boothLists = modelBooth.createRow({ 
                    additionalConditions: [
                        { field: 'BoothId', value: value.boothId},
                        { field: 'BoothName', value: value.boothName},
                        { field: 'BoothContactId', value: value.boothContactId},
                        { field: 'BoothContactName', value: value.boothContactName},
                    ],doAppend: true});
               
            } );
            modelBooth.save();
        }
        modelBooth.save();
	});
	
})(skuid);
</jsitem></javascript></resources></skuidpage>

window.CKSettings = {
    removePlugins: 'pagebreak,preview,print,save,selectall,showblocks,showborders,smiley,tab,clipboard,panelbutton,colorbutton,colordialog,templates,div,resize,elementspath,enterkey,entities,popup,filebrowser,find,flash,floatingspace,forms,htmlwriter,iframe,menubutton,language,magicline,newpage,pagebreak,selectall,subscript,superscript,showblocks,showborders,scayt,tab,tabletools,justify,bidi,font'
    ,removeButtons: 'Subscript,Superscript,Underline'
};

function SetupCKTextArea(field, value) {
    /* Create and grab DOM elements */        
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers.TEXTAREA.edit(field, value);
    var uniqid = RandomID();
    field.element.attr('id', uniqid);
    setTimeout(function(){
        var element = $("#" + uniqid + ">div");
        element.html(element.text());
        var instance = CKEDITOR.replace(element[0], window.CKSettings);
        instance.on('change', function() {
            var fieldRow = field.row
                , fieldId = field.id
                , fieldText = this.getData()
                , fieldData = {};
            fieldData[fieldId] = fieldText;
            console.log(field);
            field.model.updateRow(fieldRow, fieldData, {initiatorId : field._GUID});
            
        });
    },100);
}
function RandomID() {
    var S4 = function() {
        return (((1+Math.random())*0x10000)|0).toString(16).substring(1);
    };
    return (S4()+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+S4()+S4());
}

.cc-event-summary thead{
    background:#acacac;
    color:white;
}
.cc-event-summary table{
    border-spacing: 0px;
}

/*Exhibitor Action Items Flexbox Grid Styles*/
.nx-page .ui-widget .cc-exhibitor-flexbox-parent-active {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    width: 100%;
}
/* Allows one child to display at the correct width */
.nx-page .ui-widget .cc-exhibitor-flexbox-parent-active .sk-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    width: 100%;
}
.nx-page .ui-widget .cc-exhibitor-flexbox-parent-inactive {
    display: flex;
    align-items: flex-start;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    opacity:.5;
}
/* Allows one child to display at the correct width */
.nx-page .ui-widget .cc-exhibitor-flexbox-parent-inactive .sk-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    width: 100%;
}
/* Conditional borders for Odds/Even child flexbox divs */
.cc-exhibitor-flexbox-child:nth-child(odd) {
    width: 49%;
    float:left;
    border-bottom: dotted;
    border-right: dotted;
    border-width: 1px;
    padding-top: 15px;
    padding-bottom: 15px;
    flex: 0 0 auto;
}
.cc-exhibitor-flexbox-child:nth-child(even) {
    width: 49%;
    float:left;
    border-bottom: dotted;
    border-width: 1px;
    padding-top: 15px;
    padding-bottom: 15px;
    flex: 0 0 auto;
}
/* Conditional borders for Odds/Even child flexbox divs */
.cc-exhibitor-flexbox-child:empty {
    display: none;
}
/* Child Titles and Subtitle Content */
.cc-exhibitor-flexbox-child-content {
    font-size:14px;
    color:#A1A1A1;
    width:90%;
}
.cc-exhibitor-flexbox-child-content a i {
    font-size:8px;
}
.cc-exhibitor-flexbox-child-content strong {
    color:#000;
    font-size:16px;
    display: inline-block;
}
/* Main icon size for flex child grid */
.cc-exhibitor-icon-size {
    font-size:4em;
}
/*Notification red text*/
.cc-exhibitor-notification {
    color:red;
    font-size:12px;
    font-weight:bold;
    margin-top:10px;
    width:90%;
}
/*Hide Notification div if empty*/
.cc-exhibitor-notification:empty {
    display: none;
}
/*Float notification warning icon on top*/
.cc-exhibitor-notification-warning {
    font-size:2em;
    color:red;
    transform: translate(5px, 32px);
    position: absolute;
}
.cc-exhibitor-coming-soon-top {
    text-align: center;
    border-top: dotted;
    border-width: 1px;
    padding: 10px;
    width:95%; 
    transform: translate(0px, -1px);
}
.cc-exhibitor-coming-soon-bottom {
    border-bottom: dotted;
    text-align: center;
    border-width: 1px;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
    width: 103%;
    transform: translate(-11px, 0px);
}
.cc-exhibitor-coming-soon-bottom:empty {
    display: none;
}
/*Hide Deck Border*/
.sk-deck article {
    border:none;

   </jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateContent" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	
contextRow = params.item ? params.item.row : params.row,

var contextId = contextModel.getFieldValue(contextRow, 'Id', true);
var contextContent = contextRow.Content__c;

	/*console.log('contextId: '+contextId);
    console.log('contextContent: '+contextContent);
    console.log('contextRow: '+contextRow.HTML_Content);*/
    var inpObj = contextRow.HTML_Content;
    var scriptTagArray = ["<script>", "<\/script>", "<script type='text\/javascript'>","<\/script>"];
    for (i = 0; i < scriptTagArray.length; i++) { 
    	var isJScrpt= inpObj.indexOf(scriptTagArray[i]);
    	if(isJScrpt>-1)
    	{
    		alert('Please do not use script tag in side HTML Content');
    		return false;
    	}
    }
    
    var modelA = skuid.model.getModel('EmailTemplate');
    modelA.updateRow(
        { Id: contextId },
        { Content__c:contextRow.HTML_Content  }
    );
    
    modelA.save();</jsitem><jsitem location="inline" name="callAddValue" cachelocation="false" url="">/*
function callAddVal(param)
{
    var div = document.getElementsByClassName('cke_wysiwyg_frame cke_reset');
    
    div[0].focus() ; // DIV with cursor is 'myInstance1' (Editable DIV)
    var sel, range;
    var text =param; // Textarea containing the text to add to the myInstance1 DIV
    if (window.getSelection) {
        sel = window.getSelection();
        if (sel.getRangeAt && sel.rangeCount) 
        {
            range = sel.getRangeAt(0);
            range.deleteContents();

            var lines = text.replace("\r\n", "\n").split("\n");
            var frag = document.createDocumentFragment();
            for (var i = 0, len = lines.length; i < len; ++i) {
                if (i > 0) 
                {
                    frag.appendChild( document.createElement("br") );
                }
                frag.appendChild( document.createTextNode(lines[i]) );
            }
            range.insertNode(frag);
            div[0].focus() ;
           //$ = skuid.$;
           //alert(div[0].innerHTML);
        }
    } else if (document.selection && document.selection.createRange) {
        document.selection.createRange().text = text;
    }
}
*/</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ckTextArea" cachelocation="false">SetupCKTextArea(
	arguments[0] //Field
	, arguments[1] //Value
);</jsitem><jsitem location="inline" name="SetupCKTextArea" cachelocation="false" url="">var $ = skuid.$;

window.CKSettings = {
    removePlugins: 'pagebreak,preview,print,save,selectall,showblocks,showborders,smiley,tab,clipboard,panelbutton,colorbutton,colordialog,templates,div,resize,elementspath,enterkey,entities,popup,filebrowser,find,flash,floatingspace,forms,htmlwriter,iframe,menubutton,language,magicline,newpage,pagebreak,selectall,subscript,superscript,showblocks,showborders,scayt,tab,tabletools,justify,bidi,font'
    ,removeButtons: 'Subscript,Superscript,Underline'
};

function SetupCKTextArea(field, value) {
    /* Create and grab DOM elements */        
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers.TEXTAREA.edit(field, value);
    var uniqid = 'RandomID';
    field.element.attr('id', uniqid);
    setTimeout(function(){
        var element = $("#" + uniqid + ">div");
        element.html(element.text());
        var instance = CKEDITOR.replace(element[0], window.CKSettings, {
    extraAllowedContent: 'strong[onclick]'
});
        instance.on('change', function() {
            var fieldRow = field.row
                , fieldId = field.id
                , fieldText = this.getData()
                , fieldData = {};
            fieldData[fieldId] = fieldText;
            console.log(field);
            field.model.updateRow(fieldRow, fieldData, {initiatorId : field._GUID});
            
        });
    },500);
}
/*
function RandomID() {
    var S4 = function() {
        return (((1+Math.random())*0x10000)|0).toString(16).substring(1);
    };
    return (S4()+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+S4()+S4());
}
*/

</jsitem><jsitem location="inline" name="insertIntoEditorue" cachelocation="false" url="">function insertIntoEditor(param)
{
    var div = document.getElementsByClassName('nx-richtext-input');
    
    div[0].focus() ; // DIV with cursor is 'myInstance1' (Editable DIV)
    var sel, range;
    var text =param; // Textarea containing the text to add to the myInstance1 DIV
    if (window.getSelection) {
        sel = window.getSelection();
        if (sel.getRangeAt && sel.rangeCount) 
        {
            range = sel.getRangeAt(0);
            range.deleteContents();

            var lines = text.replace("\r\n", "\n").split("\n");
            var frag = document.createDocumentFragment();
            for (var i = 0, len = lines.length; i < len; ++i) {
                if (i > 0) 
                {
                    frag.appendChild( document.createElement("br") );
                }
                frag.appendChild( document.createTextNode(lines[i]) );
            }
            range.insertNode(frag);
            div[0].focus() ;
           //$ = skuid.$;
           //alert(div[0].innerHTML);
        }
    } else if (document.selection && document.selection.createRange) {
        document.selection.createRange().text = text;
    }

   </jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ckTextArea" cachelocation="false">SetupCKTextArea(
	arguments[0] //Field
	, arguments[1] //Value
);</jsitem><jsitem location="inline" name="SetupCKTextArea" cachelocation="false" url="">var $ = skuid.$;

window.CKSettings = {
    removePlugins: 'pagebreak,preview,print,save,selectall,showblocks,showborders,smiley,tab,clipboard,panelbutton,colorbutton,colordialog,templates,div,resize,elementspath,enterkey,entities,popup,filebrowser,find,flash,floatingspace,forms,htmlwriter,iframe,menubutton,language,magicline,newpage,pagebreak,selectall,subscript,superscript,showblocks,showborders,scayt,tab,tabletools,justify,bidi,font'
    ,removeButtons: 'Subscript,Superscript,Underline'
};

function SetupCKTextArea(field, value) {
    /* Create and grab DOM elements */        
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers.TEXTAREA.edit(field, value);
    var uniqid = RandomID();
    field.element.attr('id', uniqid);
    setTimeout(function(){
        var element = $("#" + uniqid + ">div");
        element.html(element.text());
        var instance = CKEDITOR.replace(element[0], window.CKSettings);
        instance.on('change', function() {
            var fieldRow = field.row
                , fieldId = field.id
                , fieldText = this.getData()
                , fieldData = {};
            fieldData[fieldId] = fieldText;
            console.log(field);
            field.model.updateRow(fieldRow, fieldData, {initiatorId : field._GUID});
            
        });
    },500);
}
function RandomID() {
    var S4 = function() {
        return (((1+Math.random())*0x10000)|0).toString(16).substring(1);
    };
    return (S4()+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+S4()+S4());
}

    var uFAList=[]; // Array to pupulate User Id List to pass it to Salesforce
    if (modelUFA)
    {
        //var rowsToUpdate = {};    
        for (var i=0;i<modelUFA.data.length;i++)
        {
            
                uFAList.push(modelUFA.data[i].Id);
        }
       
    }
    console.log(uFAList);
    var JSONString = JSON.stringify(uFAList, null, 2);
    console.log(JSONString);
    
    if (uFAList)
    {
        var result = sforce.apex.execute('MassFormReminderEmail','MassFormReminderEmail', {eventEditionId:eID,uFAList:JSONString},function(result){
        console.log(result);
        });
    }

	arguments[0] //Field

);</jsitem><jsitem location="inline" name="SetupCKTextArea" cachelocation="false" url="">var $ = skuid.$;

window.CKSettings = {
    removePlugins: 'pagebreak,preview,print,save,selectall,showblocks,showborders,smiley,tab,clipboard,panelbutton,colorbutton,colordialog,templates,div,resize,elementspath,enterkey,entities,popup,filebrowser,find,flash,floatingspace,forms,htmlwriter,iframe,menubutton,language,magicline,newpage,pagebreak,selectall,subscript,superscript,showblocks,showborders,scayt,tab,tabletools,justify,bidi,font'
    ,removeButtons: 'Subscript,Superscript,Underline'
};

function SetupCKTextArea(field, value) {
    /* Create and grab DOM elements */        
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers.TEXTAREA.edit(field, value);
    var uniqid = RandomID();
    field.element.attr('id', uniqid);
    setTimeout(function(){
        var element = $("#" + uniqid + ">div");
        element.html(element.text());
        var instance = CKEDITOR.replace(element[0], window.CKSettings);
        instance.on('change', function() {
            var fieldRow = field.row
                , fieldId = field.id
                , fieldText = this.getData()
                , fieldData = {};
            fieldData[fieldId] = fieldText;
            console.log(field);
            field.model.updateRow(fieldRow, fieldData, {initiatorId : field._GUID});
            
        });
    },500);
}
function RandomID() {
    var S4 = function() {
        return (((1+Math.random())*0x10000)|0).toString(16).substring(1);
    };
    return (S4()+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+S4()+S4());
}

location="inline" name="NewPageStyles" cachelocation="false">.hideLabel .hideLabel .nx-basicfieldeditor-item-label {
    display:none !important;
}
.padding {
     padding-left: 15px;
}
/*
.boxed3 {
    border-style: outset;
    border-radius: 10px;
    border: 1px solid ridge;
}
*/
.size1 {
    font-size: 20px ;
}

/*Hide table(s) action column icon. THIS WILL BREAK IF THE ACTION COLUMN IS NOT FIRST*/
.hidden-action-column td:nth-of-type(1) {
    display: none;
}
.hidden-action-column th:nth-of-type(1) {
    display: none;
}

/* Action select button style overide*/
.nx-actionselect-arrow>div.ui-icon {
    color:black;
}
.nx-actionselect-arrow {
border:none;
}
/*filterset search missmatched box size style overide*/
.nx-editor-header input.searchbox {
    width: 280px;
    padding: 4px 4px 6px 4px;
    font-size: 1em;
    border: 1px solid #aaa;
    margin: 5px 0 7px 0;
}

/*Custom download PDF button style*/
.cc-custom-button-style,
.cc-custom-button-style:hover {    
    background: #0097a7;
    font-weight: 400;
    color: black;
    border: 1px solid #0097a7;
    -webkit-border-radius: 0;
    -moz-border-radius: 0;
    border-radius: 0;
    padding-top: 3px;
    padding-bottom: 3px;
    padding-right: 8px;
    padding-left: 8px;
    margin-bottom: 7px;
    margin-right: -4px;
    margin-left: 4px;
}


.cc-custom-button-style.nx-editor a,
.cc-custom-button-style.nx-editor a:hover{
    text-decoration: none;
    color: black;
}

/*Custom "I Agree" pop up field editor styles*/
.nx-basicfieldeditor-item-label {
    width: 80%;
}
div.nx-basicfieldeditor-section-body>div.nx-basicfieldeditor-item>.nx-field, div.nx-basicfieldeditor-item>.nx-field {
    width: 3%;
    margin: 13px 0 3px 0;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-item {
    border-bottom: none;
    background: none;
}
.richTextCSS{
    text-transform: uppercase;
}

var ROW_ACTION_ICON = 'sk-icon-account-transfer';
var field = arguments[0],
    value = skuid.utils.decodeHTML(arguments[1]),
    $ = skuid.$;

skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field,value);
// If we're NOT in edit mode, then have the "link" action show a popup
if (field.mode !== 'edit') {
    if (ROW_ACTION_ICON) {
        field.element.find('a').attr('href','#').on('click',function(){
            var closestTr = field.element.closest('tr');
            var tds = closestTr.children('td');
            var actionsCell;
            if (tds.length) {
                if (tds.first().find('input[type="checkbox"]').length) {
                    actionsCell = tds[1];
                } else {
                    actionsCell = tds[0];
                }
            }
            if (actionsCell) {
                var rowAction = $(actionsCell).find('.'+ROW_ACTION_ICON);
                if (rowAction) {
                    // Trigger the click action
                    rowAction.click();
                }
            }
        });
    }
}

	arguments[0] //Field

);</jsitem><jsitem location="inline" name="SetupCKTextArea" cachelocation="false" url="">var $ = skuid.$;

window.CKSettings = {
    removePlugins: 'pagebreak,preview,print,save,selectall,showblocks,showborders,smiley,tab,clipboard,panelbutton,colorbutton,colordialog,templates,div,resize,elementspath,enterkey,entities,popup,filebrowser,find,flash,floatingspace,forms,htmlwriter,iframe,menubutton,language,magicline,newpage,pagebreak,selectall,subscript,superscript,showblocks,showborders,scayt,tab,tabletools,justify,bidi,font'
    ,removeButtons: 'Subscript,Superscript,Underline'
};

function SetupCKTextArea(field, value) {
    /* Create and grab DOM elements */        
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers.TEXTAREA.edit(field, value);
    var uniqid = RandomID();
    field.element.attr('id', uniqid);
    setTimeout(function(){
        var element = $("#" + uniqid + ">div");
        element.html(element.text());
        var instance = CKEDITOR.replace(element[0], window.CKSettings);
        instance.on('change', function() {
            var fieldRow = field.row
                , fieldId = field.id
                , fieldText = this.getData()
                , fieldData = {};
            fieldData[fieldId] = fieldText;
            console.log(field);
            field.model.updateRow(fieldRow, fieldData, {initiatorId : field._GUID});
            
        });
    },500);
}
function RandomID() {
    var S4 = function() {
        return (((1+Math.random())*0x10000)|0).toString(16).substring(1);
    };
    return (S4()+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+"-"+S4()+S4()+S4());
}

(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$.noConflict();	
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	
    	var modelCC= skuid.model.getModel('CustomerCenterCart');
    	var cartlength = modelCC.data.length;
    	var modelCart = skuid.model.getModel('CartTotal');
        var totalCartPrice1 = 0;
    	var totalCartPrice=0;
    	for(var i=0;i<cartlength;++i)
        {   
                console.log('Price1: '+modelCC.data[i].Price__c);
                if(modelCC.data[i].Price__c){
                    totalCartPrice1 = totalCartPrice1+modelCC.data[i].Price__c;
                   // hasDecimalPlace(totalCartPrice);
                  totalCartPrice= totalCartPrice1.toFixed(2);
                }
        }
        
        console.log('totalCartPrice: '+totalCartPrice);
        
        var CartTotal = modelCart.createRow({ 
                            additionalConditions: [
                                { field: 'CartTotal', value: totalCartPrice  }
                            
                            ],doAppend: true});
                       
                        modelCart.save();
	var a = modelCart.getFirstRow();
	var b = a.CartTotal;
	console.log('CartTotal: '+b);

</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateAmountDue" cachelocation="false">/*
    Field render Snippet to update the amount due when customer change the quantity on the cart page
    This snippet is called on "Price__c" filed 
*/
var field = arguments[0],
    value = arguments[1],
    $ = skuid.$,
    dt = field.metadata.displaytype;
if (field.mode != 'edit') {
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[dt][field.mode](field,value);
} else {
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[dt].edit(field,value); 
}
var calculateCost = function(){
    value = (field.model.getFieldValue(field.row,'Quantity__c',true) || 0)
        * (field.model.getFieldValue(field.row,'Rate__c',true) || 0);
    value = Math.round(value * 100) / 100;
    field.model.updateRow(
        field.row,
        'Price__c',
        value
    );
    if (field.mode == 'edit') {
        field.element.find('input').val(value);
    }
};
calculateCost();
var listener = new skuid.ui.Field(field.row,field.model,null,{fieldId: 'Price__c'});
listener.handleChange = function(){
    calculateCost();
};
field.model.registerField(listener,'Rate__c');
field.model.registerField(listener,'Quantity__c');

id="Payment_Disclaimer"/><label id="Review_Your_Contract"/><label id="Choose_Payment_Options"/></labels><css><cssitem location="inline" name="NewPageStyles" cachelocation="false">.cc-checkout-header{
    font-size:22px;
    background-color:#ebebeb;
    padding-left:36px;
    padding-top: 7px;
    padding-bottom: 7px;
}
.cc-checkout-header-accordion {
    font-size:22px;
    background-color:#ebebeb;
    padding-left:0;
    padding-top: 7px;
    padding-bottom: 7px;
}
.cc-checkout-bold {
    font-weight:bold;
}
.nx-summary .nx-fieldtext {
    font-weight:bold;
}
table.nx-skootable-data tfoot td.nx-summary {
    border-top: none;
    background-color: transparent;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-item {
    padding:0;
}
.nx-summary .type {
    display:none;
}
.cc-remove-button-style {
    background-color:transparent!important;
    border:transparent;
    color:#448CCB!important;
    text-decoration:underline;
}
.cc-remove-button-style .ui-button .ui-widget .ui-state-default .ui-corner-all .ui-button-text {
    font-weight:100;
}
.nx-pagetitle-maintitle {
    font-size: 22px;
}
.cc-checkout-payment {
    font-weight:bold;
}
.ui-button, .ui-widget-content .ui-button.ui-state-default {
    border: none;
}
.ui-button .ui-button-text {
    padding: 0.6277em 0.977em 0.6277em 0.977em;
    font-weight:bold;
    text-align: center;
}
.nx-header-center, .nx-footer-center {
    text-align: center!important;
}
/*Add underline to stripped button style*/
.ui-button .ui-button-text {
    display: block;
    font-weight: 500;
}
.ui-button .ui-widget .ui-state-default .ui-corner-all .ui-button-text-only {
    width:100%;
}
/*Hide checkbox select column*/
.nx-skootable-rowselect {
    display: none;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-item-label {
    width: 50%;
    padding-top:5px;
}
div.nx-basicfieldeditor-section-body>div.nx-basicfieldeditor-item>.nx-field, div.nx-basicfieldeditor-item>.nx-field {
    width: 50%;
}
div.nx-basicfieldeditor-section-body>div.nx-basicfieldeditor-item>.nx-field, div.nx-basicfieldeditor-item>.nx-field {
    margin: 15px 0 3px 0;
}
/*Style guid overide rules for first table*/
.cc-check-table thead {
    display: none;
}
.cc-check-table td:first-child { 
    direction: rtl;
}
div.nx-basicfieldeditor-section-body>div.nx-basicfieldeditor-item>.nx-field, div.nx-basicfieldeditor-item>.nx-field {
    margin: 0px 0 3px 0;
}
.nx-basicfieldeditor-section {
    margin: 0px 4px 4px 0;
}
.nx-field input, .nx-field textarea, .nx-field .flex-text-wrap pre, .nx-field .nx-richtext-input {
/*  margin-top:5px; */
    width: 15%;
    text-align: center;
}

$( "div" ).remove( ".nx-field" );</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="populatePrice" cachelocation="false">/*
    Snippet will call the steel brick API and pupulate the price of the added product
*/
    var params = arguments[0],
    contextRow = params.item ? params.item.row : params.row,
    contextModel = params.model,
    $ = skuid.$;
    
    // Getting context row of the Product 
    var CustomerCenterId = contextModel.getFieldValue(contextRow, 'Id', true);
   
    var ProductId = contextModel.getFieldValue(contextRow, 'Product__c', true);
    var contextContent = contextRow.Product__r.Name;
  	console.log('Context ProductId: '+ProductId);
    console.log('Context Product: '+contextContent);
    ///////
   
    //Getting the Pricebook Object Name
    var modelE = skuid.model.getModel('Pricebook');
    var rowE = modelE.getFirstRow();
    var PricebookObjName= rowE.Name;
    PricebookObjName=PricebookObjName.split(' ').join('_');
    PricebookObjName+='__c';
    
    console.log('PricebookObjName: '+PricebookObjName);
    
     
    //Getting Event ID
    var modelA = skuid.model.getModel('EventDetail');
    var rowA = modelA.getFirstRow();
    var eventId= rowA.Id;
    console.log('eventName: '+rowA.Name);
    
    var result = sforce.apex.execute('GetProductPriceOnCustomerPortal','getProductPriceOnCustomerPortal', {ProductId:ProductId, PricebookObjName:PricebookObjName, eventId:eventId},function(result){
        //console.log('Result: '+result);
        var parsedResult = JSON.parse(result);
        var parsedLen = parsedResult.length;
        var modelForRelatedProductPrice = skuid.model.getModel('CustomerCenterCart');
        var TotalPriceofRelatedProducts = 0;
        for(var i=0;i<parsedLen;++i)
        { 
            var modelProduct = skuid.model.getModel('CustomerCenterCart');
            var modelOption = skuid.model.getModel('RelatedProducts');
            if(parsedResult[i].PrimaryProduct===true){
                console.log('Primary: '+parsedResult[i].Price);
                modelProduct.updateRow(
                    { Id: CustomerCenterId },
                    { Price:parsedResult[i].Price } 
                   
                );
                modelProduct.save();
            }   
            else{
               console.log('Option: '+parsedResult[i].ProductName);
               console.log('Option: '+parsedResult[i].Price);
               TotalPriceofRelatedProducts = TotalPriceofRelatedProducts + Number(parsedResult[i].Price);
               
                var productList = modelOption.createRow({ 
                    additionalConditions: [
                        { field: 'ProductID', value: parsedResult[i].ProductID},
                        { field: 'ProductName', value: parsedResult[i].ProductName},
                        { field: 'Price', value: parsedResult[i].Price},
                        { field: 'Type', value: parsedResult[i].Type},
                        { field: 'Feature', value: parsedResult[i].Feature},
                        { field: 'Quantity', value: parsedResult[i].Quantity},
                        { field: 'ProductFamily', value: parsedResult[i].ProductFamily},
                    ],doAppend: true});
               modelOption.save();
               
            } 
            
            
        }
         modelForRelatedProductPrice.updateRow(
                    { Id: CustomerCenterId },
                    { PriceRelatedProducts:TotalPriceofRelatedProducts } 
                   
                );
                modelForRelatedProductPrice.save();
     });
  
    </jsitem><jsitem location="inline" name="populateCartTotal" cachelocation="false" url="">/*

*/
(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$.noConflict();	
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    
	    console.log("Girikon 111");
	
    	var modelCC= skuid.model.getModel('CustomerCenterCart');
    	var cartlength = modelCC.data.length;
        var modelCart = skuid.model.getModel('CartTotal');
        var totalCartPrice = 0;
    	
    	for(var i=0;i<cartlength;++i)
        {   
                console.log('Price: '+modelCC.data[i].Price__c);
                if(modelCC.data[i].Price__c){
                    totalCartPrice = totalCartPrice+modelCC.data[i].Price__c;
                }
        }
        console.log('totalCartPrice: '+totalCartPrice);
        
        var CartTotal = modelCart.createRow({ 
                            additionalConditions: [
                                { field: 'CartTotal', value: totalCartPrice }
                            
                            ],doAppend: true});
                       
                        modelCart.save();
	var a = modelCart.getFirstRow();
	var b = a.CartTotal;
	console.log('CartTotal: '+b);
	//update mastercart amount
	var modelMC= skuid.model.getModel('MasterCart');
	var rowMC= modelMC.getFirstRow();
     modelMC.updateRow(rowMC, 'Total_Amount__c', totalCartPrice);
     //modelMC.updateRow(rowMC, 'Final_Amount__c', totalCartPrice);
     modelMC.save();
	});

    </jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateTotalCheckBox" cachelocation="false">/*
    Snippet to upate the total amount  and tax as per user slection of the To Pay amount
*/
var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	var dfd = jQuery.Deferred();
    var modelMC= skuid.model.getModel('MasterCart');
	var row= modelMC.getFirstRow();
    var tax= row.Total_Tax_Amount__c;
    var invoiceTax = row.Invoice_Tax__c;
    console.log('tax'+tax);
    var finalAmount =0;
    var paymentAmount=0;
    if (tax)
    {
        console.log(tax);
    }
    else
    {
        tax =0;
    }
    if (invoiceTax)
    {
        console.log(invoiceTax);
    }
    else
    {
        invoiceTax =0;
    }
    if (row.Partial_Amount_CK__c===true)
    {  
        //modelMC.updateRow(row, 'Final_Amount_CK__c', false);modelMC.save();
        finalAmount = invoiceTax + row.Partial_Amount__c;
        paymentAmount= row.Partial_Amount__c;
        modelMC.updateRow(
            { Id: row.Id},
            {
                //Invoice_Tax__c:invoiceTax,
                PaymentAmount:paymentAmount,
                Final_Amount__c: finalAmount,
                Final_Amount_CK__c:false
            }
        );
        modelMC.save();
        
    }
    else if (row.Partial_Amount_CK__c===false)
    { 
        //modelMC.updateRow(row, 'Final_Amount_CK__c', true);modelMC.save();
        finalAmount = tax + row.Total_Amount__c;
        paymentAmount= row.Total_Amount__c;
        console.log('ful'+finalAmount);
        modelMC.updateRow(
            { Id: row.Id},
            {
                //Invoice_Tax__c:tax,
                PaymentAmount:paymentAmount,
                Final_Amount__c: finalAmount,
                Final_Amount_CK__c:true
            }
        );
    }
    
    dfd.resolve();
    return dfd.promise();

      </jsitem><jsitem location="inline" name="updatePartialAmount" cachelocation="false" url="">/*
    Page load snippet to capture the payment schedule and due date
    Also update the partial amount to be paid as per payment schdule due date
*/

(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function()
	{
	     console.log("Girikon 222");
    	var eventDetailModel = skuid.model.getModel('EventDetail');
        var eventDetail = eventDetailModel.getFirstRow();
        var eventPaymentSchedule = eventDetail.Payment_Schedule__c;
        
        var nextPaymentDate;
        var NextPaymentSchedule;
        console.log(eventPaymentSchedule);
        //console.log(cutOffDate);
        
        var eventPaymentSchedule2 = eventPaymentSchedule.split('-');
        console.log('----'+eventPaymentSchedule2.length);
        var p1='';
        var p2='';
        var p3='';
        var p4='';
        if(eventPaymentSchedule2[0]){
            p1 =parseInt(eventPaymentSchedule2[0]);
        }
        if(eventPaymentSchedule2[1]){
            p2 =parseInt(eventPaymentSchedule2[1]);
        }
        if(eventPaymentSchedule2[2]){
            p3 =parseInt(eventPaymentSchedule2[2]);
        }
        if(eventPaymentSchedule2[3]){
            p4 =parseInt(eventPaymentSchedule2[3]);
        }
    	var modelCC= skuid.model.getModel('MasterCart');
    	var row= modelCC.getFirstRow();
    	var totalAmount= row.Total_Amount__c;
    	var partialAmount;
        var date='',date1='',date2='',date3='';
        var today = new Date(Date.now());
        console.log('today'+today);
        if (eventDetail.X50_Cutoff_Date__c)
        {
            date = skuid.time.parseSFDate(eventDetail.X50_Cutoff_Date__c);//new Date(eventDetail.X50_Cutoff_Date__c);
            //console.log(date);
        }
        if (eventDetail.Cutoff_Date_1__c)
        {
           date1 = skuid.time.parseSFDate(eventDetail.Cutoff_Date_1__c);//new Date(eventDetail.Cutoff_Date_1__c);
            //console.log(date1);
        }
        if (eventDetail.Cutoff_Date_2__c)
        {
            date2 = skuid.time.parseSFDate(eventDetail.Cutoff_Date_2__c);//new Date(eventDetail.Cutoff_Date_2__c);
            //console.log(date2);
        }
        if (eventDetail.Cutoff_Date_3__c)
        {
            date3 = skuid.time.parseSFDate(eventDetail.Cutoff_Date_3__c);//new Date(eventDetail.Cutoff_Date_3__c);
            //console.log(date3);
        }
        console.log(Date.now());
        // comparing offset date with today's date
        if(date>today)
    	{
    	    partialAmount=(totalAmount*p1)/100;
    	    PaymentSchedule= p1;
    	    //console.log(partialAmount);
    	} 
    	if(date<=today&&date1>today||date<=today&&!date1 )
    	{
    	    partialAmount=(totalAmount*(p1+p2))/100;
    	    PaymentSchedule=p1+p2;
    	
    	}
    	if(date1<=today&&date2>today ||date1<=today&&!date2 ) 
    	{
    	    partialAmount=(totalAmount*(p1+p2+p3))/100;
    	    PaymentSchedule=p1+p2+p3;
    	     
    	}
    	//console.log(date3);
    	if (date2)
    	{
    	    console.log(date2);
    	    console.log(today);
    	    console.log(date3);
            if(date2<=today&&date3>today ||date2<=today&&!date3) 
        	{
        	    partialAmount=(totalAmount*(p1+p2+p3+p4))/100;
                PaymentSchedule=p1+p2+p3+p4;
    	        //nextPaymentDate=date4;
    	        //NextPaymentSchedule=p1+p2+p3+p4;
        	}
    	}
    	if(date3)

(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	console.log("Girikon 333");
	var dfd = jQuery.Deferred();
    var modelMC= skuid.model.getModel('MasterCart');
	var row= modelMC.getFirstRow();
    var tax= row.Total_Tax_Amount__c;
    var invoiceTax = row.Invoice_Tax__c;
    console.log('tax'+tax);
    var finalAmount;
    var paymentAmount;
    if (tax)
    {
        console.log(tax);
    }
    else
    {
        tax =0;
    }
    if (invoiceTax)
    {
        console.log(invoiceTax);
    }
    else
    {
        invoiceTax =0;
    }
    if (row.Partial_Amount_CK__c===true)
    {  
        //modelMC.updateRow(row, 'Final_Amount_CK__c', false);modelMC.save();
        finalAmount = invoiceTax + row.Partial_Amount__c;
        paymentAmount= row.Partial_Amount__c;
        modelMC.updateRow(
            { Id: row.Id},
            {
                //Invoice_Tax__c:invoiceTax,
                PaymentAmount:paymentAmount,
                Final_Amount__c: finalAmount,
                Final_Amount_CK__c:false
            }
        );
        modelMC.save();
        
    }
    else if (row.Partial_Amount_CK__c===false)
    { 
        //modelMC.updateRow(row, 'Final_Amount_CK__c', true);modelMC.save();
        finalAmount = tax + row.Total_Amount__c;
        paymentAmount= row.Total_Amount__c;
        console.log('ful'+finalAmount);
        modelMC.updateRow(
            { Id: row.Id},
            {
                //Invoice_Tax__c:tax,
                PaymentAmount:paymentAmount,
                Final_Amount__c: finalAmount,
                Final_Amount_CK__c:true
            }
        );
    }
    
    dfd.resolve();
    return dfd.promise();
    
    /*var params = arguments[0],

	});

sourcetype="fieldvalue" nosourcerowbehavior="deactivate" field="Add_To_Cart_Visibility__c" value="true"/></renderconditions><contents><script>
var $ = skuid.$;
    var a;
     
$('.qtyplus').click(function(e){
        // Stop acting like a button
           var modelA = skuid.model.getModel('Quantity');
           var row= modelA.getFirstRow();
           console.log('Id'+row.Id);
           console.log('Quantity'+row.Quantity);
         e.preventDefault();
        // Get the field name
        fieldName = $(this).attr('field');
        // Get its current value
        //var modelA = skuid.model.getModel('ContactEvent');
        var currentVal = parseInt($('input[name='+fieldName+']').val());
        // If is not undefined
        if (!isNaN(currentVal) && currentVal < 10) {      // set limit to 10
            // Increment
            $('input[name='+fieldName+']').val(currentVal + 1);
            
           
        } else {
            // Otherwise put a 1 there
             $('input[name='+fieldName+']').val(1);
            
            
        }
        a=currentVal+1;
        console.log('plus = '+a);
        
       modelA.emptyData();   modelA.save();
       modelA.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                {field: 'Quantity', value: a},
            ]
        });
    modelA.save();
    
      
    });
    // This button will decrement the value till 1
   $(".qtyminus").click(function(e) {
        // Stop acting like a button
        var modelA = skuid.model.getModel('Quantity');
           var row= modelA.getFirstRow();
           console.log('Id'+row.Id);
           console.log('Quantity'+row.Quantity);
        e.preventDefault();
        
        // Get the field name
        fieldName = $(this).attr('field');
        // Get its current value
        
        var currentVal = parseInt($('input[name='+fieldName+']').val());
        // If it isn't undefined or its greater than 0
        var row = modelA.getFirstRow;
        
        if (!isNaN(currentVal) && currentVal > 1) {
            // Decrement one
            $('input[name='+fieldName+']').val(currentVal - 1);
            
           
        } else {
            // Otherwise put a 0 there
            $('input[name='+fieldName+']').val(1);
            
            
        }
        a=currentVal-1;
        if(a==0)
        {
            a=1;
        }
   
       modelA.emptyData();   modelA.save();
    
       modelA.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                {field: 'Quantity', value: a},
            ]
        });
    modelA.save();
     
        
    });

</script>

    <span class='qtyminus' field='quantity' ><i class="fa fa-minus-circle" style="width:18px;height: 32px;font-size: 1.5em;"  aria-hidden="true"  ></i></span>
    <input type='text' name='quantity' value='1' class='qty' readonly />
    <span class='qtyplus' field='quantity' ><i class="fa fa-plus-circle" aria-hidden="true" style="width:18px;height: 32px;font-size: 1.5em;" ></i></span>

/** <a href="http://www.jqueryscript.net/tags.php?/Carousel/">Carousel</a> **/

.carousel {
position: relative;

}
.carousel ul {

}
.carousel li {

/** Carousel Controls **/

.carousel-control-prev, .carousel-control-next {

}
.carousel-control-prev {

}
.carousel-control-next {

}
.carousel-control-prev:hover span, .carousel-control-next:hover span {
